runs.comm: big away swing straightaway, lands outside off and swerves, left alone safely
Ali fishes at this one outside off, he wasnt sure what to do with that
drifts on the pads and he clips it away off his pads down to fine leg
swings it in and he gets an inside edge to the thigh pad, Sadiq sprints quickly to the other end
A super confident Sadiq walks down the pitch early to challenge Praveen early but he's completely beaten for swing, easy Mr Sadiq, easy
now he tries to smash that into the sea,  makes width and swishes hard at thin air
cuts back in and he knocks it towards square leg for a single
he gives him width outside off and he opens the face of the bat and angles it to square third man
Sadiq still fails to make contact, this one holds its line and beats the edge as it goes to the keeper
Sadiq was a walking wicket all along, Nehra bowls it a bit short on the leg stump, Sadiq follows it, makes room and tries to pull but the ball clips his glove and lobs to Dhoni, easy decision
skids towards the pads and he clips it away in the air and down to the vacant midwicket region
he's forced on the backfoot and uneasily fends it to the on side
this time he manages to clip it away off his pads and beats short midwicket, Gambhir picks it up
this one straightens but the batsman doesn't move his feet and nearly edges it to the keeper
Praveen bowls a poor ball and Noor makes him pay, he strays on the pads and Noor shuffles and gently works it on its way to fine leg
punched in the air to the off side and Jadeja does extremely well to slide and cut it off one handed
that just fizzed through and nearly cleaned up Noor, so close to the outside edge outside off
one for the highlights reel! He stays beside the line and punches it sweetly past backward point, great timing
frees his arms! Nehra drifts on the pads and Shahzad heaves it across the line and beats square leg, that sped away
nips back in sharply and Shahzad hops at the crease and fends it off

the short one does the trick again! Nehra bangs it down the leg side and Shahzad tries to hook but ends up lobbing it to Dhoni, the ball hits the helmet for sure but did it catch the glove or the edge as well? Erasmus thought it clipped something else too
plays high on the bat and defends to the off side
forced on the backfoot again to defend
stays rooted to the crease and defends back to the bowler
excellent running, just taps it with soft hands in front of mid-off and calls immediately
bangs it short down the leg side and  Mangal fails in his attempt to whack it
teases him outside the off stump and Mangal stays at the crease and plays half heartedly at it
goes for the flat batted swat and he succeeds in beating Harbhajan at mid-on, he didnt time his dive well
tucked towards fine leg
he gives him the charge immediately but places it to mid-off
defended softly to the on side
flighted on leg and tucked down to mid-on
Mangal tries to take Jadeja downtown but the journey ends at mid-off, comes down the pitch but ends up chipping it to Gambhir at a comfortable height
tucked in the air to short square leg
gets forward and defends
tosses it up slowly outside off and he drives to sweeper cover
full and in the length to drive and he pushes it to short extra cover
driven to short extra cover again
stays back and punches it down to mid-on
skids through and he stays back and defends
bowls it flat and short and he punches it wide of mid-off
tossed up outside off and drives to cover
gets forward and checks his shot to mid-on
well tossed up and he gets a leading edge to the off side
quicker through the air and softly defended
the straighter one this time and the batsman's beaten
Noor makes a lot of room and cuts him down to deep point
good shot! Noor makes room, reads the length early, rocks back and slaps it over extra cover, beats the fielder in the deep
turned towards midwicket
gets well forward and defends
fires it full and flat and catches him low on the front pad outside the line of leg, stifled appeal
gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
comes forward  but he can't work it away for a run
gets forward and drives wide of mid-off
punched towards cover and he scampers the single
staggers at the crease, the ball bounces a bit more and hits his pad
extra bounce again and he nearly feathers an edge
quicker through the air and defended down the pitch
full and driven down to long-on
first one over the ropes! He uses his feet to a delivery pitched on middle and leg and heaves it over deep midwicket
turned to the on side
nearly gets a leading edge back to the bowler
quicker through the air an clipped to square leg
sashays down the track but checks his shot and punches it to cover
makes a lot of room and cuts him down to short third  man
tossed up and he clips it in the air down to deep midwicket
turns it to deep square leg
stays back and defends
stays back and defends to the on side
punches it towards mid-on
comes down the pitch and checks his shot to the on side
down the pitch again and he drives it down to midwicket
take a bow Asghar! He reads the flight early, gets on his knee early and heaves him over deep midwicket, it's a big ground and he has enough power on it to clear the rope
that's confidence for you, he makes room, chips down the track and carves it over extra cover
plays very late and pushes it to mid-off
stays back and clips him down to midwicket
goes back and punches it down to deep point
attempts a yorker but he digs out a low full toss down to deep point
fired on the pads and clipped down to deep midwicket
down the track and punches it to long-off
places it straight to cover
attempts the reverse sweep but he finds point
makes room to cut but finds point again
tossed up on the pads and he clips him down to long-on
comes down the track and chips it in the air towards long-on, Raina picks it up
tossed up and tucked towards fine leg
well done! Asghar Stanikzai reads the flight early, gets on his knee and shovels it about 7 rows back over deep midwicket
slides down the leg side
tucks it down to square leg
flighted on middle and leg and pushed to long-on
opens the face of the bat and steers it inside out to point
bangs it in short and Noor bends his knee and sways away
tucks it down to square leg and that's his fifty! Commendable performance from the opener
the slower bouncer and he stays at the crease and pulls along the turf to square leg
the short one works again for Nehra, Noor makes room and tries to slog him away but the ball clips the edge and lobs to the keeper
Nabi is cramped for room and he tucks it back to the bowler
Praveen hits the deck hard and gets a wicket, Stanikzai stays at the crease to pull but gets a top edge taken easily by Zaheer near midwicket
catching practice again, Nabi tries to smack this over the on side but gets a tame top edge taken  by Dhoni, he barely had to move from his position
the hat-trick ball is not a short one for some reason, on the pads and tucked down to mid-on
another full delivery outside off this time and pushed down to cover
low full toss, squeezed down to long-off
yorker length on middle and squirted past the bowler
good length on middle and leg and clipped down to deep square leg
the short ball cramps him up for room, looked like he attempted the upper cut, missed it completely
comes down the pitch and heaves, gets a top edge over the keeper and three men converge, Zaheer runs across from third man and cuts it off
gets a bit of width outside off, gets his front foot forward and slaps it wide of mid-off, not elegant but effective
terrible mixup, he squeezes out a yorker towards midwicket and sets off, Shenwari sets off but his partner wasn't interested, Jadeja lobs the ball to Dhoni but batsmen were at the other end
makes a bit of room and uneasily taps it to mid-off
full delivery on the leg stump and pushed hard to long-on
full on the stumps and driven to the off side
makes room to a yorker but fails to dig it out
Hassan didn't know where that went, made some room to club it over the on side but got a thick top edge over the keeper
makes room to a full delivery and scoops it down Nehra's throat at mid-off
squeezes out a full delivery down to long-on
